text.section: The Department shall operate and manage the Baltimore City Juvenile Justice Center as a centralized regional juvenile intake, assessment, court, and detention facility for Baltimore City.

section.section: After the processing of fingerprints, the Criminal Justice Information System Central Repository shall provide to the Department, in accordance with State and federal law, information concerning children taken into custody under subsection (c) of this section.

Information concerning a child disseminated from the Criminal Justice Information System Central Repository is a police record under § 10-101(h) of the Criminal Procedure Article and may not be redisseminated except in accordance with § 3-8A-27(a) of the Courts Article.

text.section:
Subject to the authority of the Secretary:
the managing director of the Baltimore City Juvenile Justice Center is its chief administrator; and
the director of detention of the Baltimore City Juvenile Justice Center is its administrator of juvenile detention.
